description: Military and civilian ships for all factions

military.designLanguage: Saucer section + engineering hull + warp nacelles - VARIES by era and class
military.colors: Light gray hull, red Bussard collectors, blue deflector dish, blue warp glow

classVariants.Constitution: TOS ERA: CYLINDRICAL engineering hull, CIRCULAR saucer, TWO nacelles on ANGLED pylons behind saucer. Classic 1960s design. Reference: USS Enterprise NCC-1701
classVariants.Galaxy: TNG ERA: LARGE ELLIPTICAL saucer, LONG neck to stardrive section, TWO nacelles on SWEPT-BACK pylons. Massive exploration cruiser. Reference: Enterprise-D
classVariants.Sovereign: MOVIE ERA: SLEEK elongated design, ARROW-SHAPED saucer, nacelles close to hull. More aggressive than Galaxy. Reference: Enterprise-E
classVariants.Intrepid: COMPACT design, ANGULAR saucer, variable-geometry nacelles that FOLD. Small explorer. Reference: USS Voyager
classVariants.Defiant: COMPACT WARSHIP - NO saucer, NO neck, BLOCKY aggressive shape. Escort/battleship hybrid. Reference: USS Defiant DS9
classVariants.Miranda: SINGLE hull with nacelles BELOW, ROLLBAR on top with weapons pod. No separate saucer. Reference: USS Reliant
classVariants.Excelsior: SLEEK 1980s design, FLAT saucer, LONG engineering hull, graceful nacelle pylons. Reference: USS Excelsior
classVariants.Nebula: Galaxy-class components REARRANGED - saucer with SENSOR POD on top, nacelles different config
classVariants.Akira: CATAMARAN style - TWO hulls with WEAPONS POD between. Heavy carrier/cruiser

military.important: Federation ships are NOT all Galaxy-class! Each era and role has distinct silhouette

civilian.designLanguage: Utilitarian, boxy cargo haulers or sleek transports - NO military features
civilian.colors: Varied civilian colors - white, blue, orange. No Starfleet gray

military.designLanguage: Varied aggressive designs - each class has DISTINCT silhouette
military.colors: Dark green hull, red accent lights, gunmetal gray, bronze details

classVariants.Bird of Prey: SMALL/MEDIUM ship with TWO SWEPT-BACK WINGS like a bird. Wings can FOLD (up=cruise, down=attack). Central body. Reference: Klingon Bird of Prey from Star Trek III
classVariants.B'rel: SMALL Bird of Prey scout. Triangular body, movable wing configuration. 12-man crew
classVariants.K'Vort: LARGE Bird of Prey, cruiser-sized. Wider wingspan than B'rel
classVariants.D7: HAMMERHEAD SHAPE: Bulbous COMMAND POD at front, LONG THIN NECK, rear BODY with TWO ANGLED NACELLES on short wings. NOT bird-shaped! Reference: TOS Klingon Battlecruiser
classVariants.K't'inga: Upgraded D7 with MORE DETAIL. Same hammerhead silhouette. Reference: Star Trek The Motion Picture
classVariants.Vor'cha: ELONGATED PREDATOR: Long POINTED NOSE, raised BRIDGE section, angular hull, weapon pods. Like an aggressive dagger. Reference: TNG/DS9 Klingon Attack Cruiser
classVariants.Negh'Var: MASSIVE DREADNOUGHT: Very WIDE BODY, multiple visible DECKS, heavy ARMOR, prominent COMMAND TOWER. Flagship. Reference: DS9 Klingon Flagship
classVariants.Raptor: SLEEK INTERCEPTOR: Needle-like nose, small forward-swept wings. Fast attack. Reference: Enterprise era

military.important: Klingon ships are NOT all Bird of Prey! D7/K't'inga=hammerhead, Vor'cha=dagger, Negh'Var=massive

civilian.designLanguage: Rugged industrial vessels, transport barges, worn and functional
civilian.colors: Dark industrial colors, rust, worn metal, utilitarian

military.designLanguage: Predatory bird aesthetic, elegant curves, GREEN hull with bird markings
military.colors: Dark green hull, bronze/copper accents, bird-of-prey paint schemes

classVariants.D'deridex: MASSIVE DOUBLE-HULL WARBIRD: Two hulls forming OPEN SPACE in center (negative space). Bird-head at front. Reference: TNG Romulan Warbird
classVariants.Valdore: SLEEKER single-hull warbird, more compact than D'deridex. Aggressive angles. Reference: Star Trek Nemesis
classVariants.Scimitar: MASSIVE DREADNOUGHT with WINGS, heavily armed. Thalaron weapon ship. Reference: Nemesis villain ship
classVariants.Bird of Prey TOS: SMALL compact warbird, different from Klingon BoP. Plasma weapon under hull. Reference: TOS Balance of Terror
classVariants.T'Liss: Light warbird, patrol vessel. Single hull, elegant curves

military.important: Romulan ships have NO visible nacelles - propulsion is internal. Double-hull warbirds have distinctive negative space

civilian.designLanguage: Secretive, nondescript vessels that could pass as neutral
civilian.colors: Muted greens and grays, minimal markings

military.designLanguage: INSECTOID/COBRA shape - pointed head, segmented body, ochre/brown
military.colors: Brown/tan hull, yellow/amber accent lights, copper details

classVariants.Galor: COBRA HEAD shape: Pointed BOW, WIDE NECK section, tapering BODY. Main cruiser. Reference: DS9 Cardassian Warship
classVariants.Keldon: LARGER Galor variant with additional WEAPONS POD on dorsal. More angular
classVariants.Hideki: SMALL patrol ship, BEETLE-like. Compact fighter/scout

military.important: Cardassian ships look like INSECTS or COBRAS - segmented, ridged hulls, pointed bows

military.designLanguage: Varied profit-driven designs - Marauders are crescent, but other ships differ
military.colors: Orange hull, gold accents, bronze details, ostentatious wealth display

classVariants.D'Kora: CRESCENT MOON / HORSESHOE shape - the SIGNATURE Ferengi Marauder. Curved main body with OPEN CENTER, bridge pod at one end. Reference: TNG
classVariants.Marauder: Same as D'Kora - curved crescent, open center. The classic Ferengi warship
classVariants.Nagus: YACHT-style luxury vessel - SLEEK elongated design, NOT crescent. For Grand Nagus and wealthy Ferengi
classVariants.Trader: BOXY cargo hauler - RECTANGULAR hull maximizing cargo space. Function over form
classVariants.Salvage: IRREGULAR shape with GRAPPLING ARMS and tractor beam arrays. Industrial salvage ship
classVariants.Pod: Small TEARDROP shuttle. Simple curved shape
classVariants.Frigate: ANGULAR compact warship - smaller, more aggressive than Marauder. Not crescent-shaped
classVariants.Transport: BULBOUS cargo ship - ROUND or OVAL hull for maximum storage. Like a flying warehouse
classVariants.Raider: WEDGE-shaped fast attack - pointed bow, swept wings. Built for speed and piracy

military.important: Only D'Kora/Marauder class is crescent-shaped! Other Ferengi ships prioritize FUNCTION (cargo space, speed, luxury) over uniform design

civilian.designLanguage: Extremely varied - each ship customized for profit potential
civilian.colors: Gold, orange, bronze - the gaudier the wealthier the owner

classVariants.Cargo Hauler: MASSIVE BOXY freighter - maximizes cargo volume. Orange industrial
classVariants.Passenger Liner: ELONGATED luxury ship - many windows, comfortable design
classVariants.Mining Ship: UTILITARIAN with drilling/extraction equipment. Not pretty but profitable
classVariants.Shuttle: Small personal transport - varies by owner wealth (cheap boxy to sleek luxury)

avoid: Impractical shapes that waste cargo space

military.designLanguage: PERFECT GEOMETRIC SHAPES - cubes, spheres, no organic curves
military.colors: Dark gray/black, GREEN lights and accents, no windows

classVariants.Cube: PERFECT CUBE - all sides equal. Green internal glow. Reference: TNG/VOY Borg Cube
classVariants.Sphere: PERFECT SPHERE - used for time travel, smaller than cube. Reference: First Contact
classVariants.Tactical Cube: Cube with EXTRA ARMOR plating, more weapon hardpoints. Darker
classVariants.Diamond: OCTAHEDRON shape - two pyramids base-to-base. Queen's ship

military.important: Borg ships are GEOMETRIC - no curves, no windows, no aesthetic design. Pure function

civilian.note: Borg have NO civilian ships - all vessels serve the Collective

military.designLanguage: ORGANIC INSECTOID shapes, purple/violet, bioluminescent
military.colors: Purple/violet hull, glowing purple accents, organic appearance

classVariants.Jem'Hadar Fighter: BEETLE/SCARAB shape - compact, curved hull, small and agile. Purple. Reference: DS9
classVariants.Jem'Hadar Battlecruiser: LARGE insectoid shape, multiple weapon pods

military.important: Dominion ships look ORGANIC and INSECTOID - like alien beetles, not mechanical

military.designLanguage: ASYMMETRIC angular design, cold blue/white colors, mysterious
military.colors: Ice blue, white, silver metallic

classVariants.Chel Grett: PRIMARY BREEN WARSHIP: Distinctive ASYMMETRIC hull with angular protrusions on one side. Medium combat vessel. Teal-blue hull with crystalline accents. NOT symmetrical.
classVariants.Plesh Brek: FAST BREEN RAIDER: Sleek asymmetric attack ship. Angular design optimized for speed. Ice-blue/teal hull with sharp jutting edges.
classVariants.Sar Theln: BREEN CARRIER: Large asymmetric hull with multiple fighter launch bays arranged unevenly. Cold blue with silver panels.
classVariants.Rezreth: BREEN DREADNOUGHT: Massive flagship. Extreme asymmetric profile - largest and most powerful Breen vessel. Ice-blue and white with crystalline weapon arrays.
classVariants.Bleth Choas: BREEN HEAVY CRUISER: Powerful asymmetric warship with heavy armor. Dark teal with ice-blue weapon accents.
classVariants.Thot Command: BREEN COMMAND VESSEL: Flag officer's cruiser. Enhanced communication arrays. Distinctive command spire. Asymmetric ice-blue design.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Breen patrol ship. Compact but still deliberately asymmetric. Cold blue tones.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Breen warship. Distinctive asymmetric design with energy dampening weapon. Ice-blue with teal.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Breen warship. Heavily armed asymmetric hull. Multiple weapon arrays. Imposing ice-blue.
classVariants.Dreadnought: MASSIVE Breen dreadnought. Extreme asymmetric form. Bristling with energy dampener arrays.

military.important: Breen ships are deliberately ASYMMETRIC and mysterious-looking

military.designLanguage: REPTILIAN aesthetic, heavy armor, green/bronze
military.colors: Dark green, bronze, scaled texture appearance

classVariants.Vishap: GORN VISHAP CLASS: Main combat cruiser. Heavy armored hull with SCALED TEXTURE. Prominent forward plasma weapons. Dark green/brown. Bulky, powerful silhouette.
classVariants.Tuatara: GORN TUATARA CLASS: Armored cruiser variant. Thick hull plating resembling reptilian SCALES. Multiple weapon mounts. Dark green. Compact and brutal.
classVariants.Draguas: GORN DRAGUAS CLASS: Fast heavy destroyer. More streamlined than cruisers but still massively armored. Powerful forward plasma array. Dark green/bronze.
classVariants.Zilant: GORN ZILANT CLASS: Battleship. MASSIVE armored warship. Multiple plasma cannon batteries. Thick reptilian hull plating like dragon scales. Dark green, heavy bronze accents.
classVariants.Balaur: GORN BALAUR CLASS: Dreadnought. LARGEST Gorn vessel. Multiple weapon pods giving HYDRA-like appearance. Enormous, brutally armored. Dark green.
classVariants.Varanus: GORN VARANUS CLASS: Support/repair vessel. Armored hull with medical and engineering bays. Slower but essential fleet support. Dark green.
classVariants.Cruiser: BULKY armored design, reptilian aesthetic. Reference: TOS Arena, SNW Gorn ships
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL but heavily armored Gorn patrol ship. Compact brutal design. Dark green.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Gorn battleship. Extremely heavy armor. Massive plasma arrays. Like a reptilian fortress.
classVariants.Dreadnought: MASSIVE Gorn dreadnought. Overwhelming firepower and armor. A mountain of weapons.

military.important: Gorn ships look HEAVY and ARMORED - like reptilian tanks

military.designLanguage: ABSOLUTELY NO SAUCER SECTIONS! Andorian ships are RAPTOR/BIRD-OF-PREY shaped: LONG NARROW POINTED HULL (like an arrow or spear) with MULTIPLE SWEPT-BACK WING PYLONS extending backward from the hull sides. Think aggressive predatory bird with wings swept back, NOT a disc or saucer shape!
military.colors: BLUE-GRAY to TEAL primary hull, CYAN/TURQUOISE glowing accents, DARK BLUE panels, SILVER metallic trim. Cold icy color palette
features: NO SAUCER - elongated arrow/spear shaped hull
POINTED SHARP BOW like a blade
4-6 SWEPT-BACK WING PYLONS extending rearward from hull

classVariants.Kumari: ANDORIAN KUMARI CLASS: NO SAUCER! ARROW-SHAPED elongated hull with SHARP POINTED BOW. FOUR SWEPT-BACK WING PYLONS extending rearward with nacelles at tips. Blue-gray hull. Looks like a predatory bird, NOT like Federation ships! Reference: Enterprise era Kumari
classVariants.Charal: ANDORIAN CHARAL CLASS: NO SAUCER! Tactical escort with POINTED ARROW hull and SWEPT-BACK WING PYLONS. Enhanced weapons at wing tips. Blue-teal hull. Fast predator shape.
classVariants.Khyzon: ANDORIAN KHYZON CLASS: NO SAUCER! Heavy escort with reinforced ARROW hull and SWEPT-BACK WINGS. Heavier armor and weapons. Blue-gray. Most combat-ready escort.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Andorian patrol ship. NO SAUCER - compact pointed hull with swept-back wings. Blue-teal. Quick and agile predator.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Andorian cruiser. NO SAUCER - full arrow-shaped hull with multiple swept-back wing pylons. Blue-gray with cyan glow.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Andorian battleship. NO SAUCER - extended pointed hull with heavy swept-back wings. Weapons on all pylons. Imposing blue-gray.
classVariants.Dreadnought: MASSIVE Andorian flagship. NO SAUCER - largest arrow/spear hull design with multiple swept-back wing arrays. Blue-gray and silver.
classVariants.Carrier: ANDORIAN carrier. NO SAUCER - wide arrow hull with swept-wing design and integrated fighter bays. Blue-teal.

military.important: CRITICAL: Andorian ships have NO SAUCER! They are ARROW/SPEAR shaped with SWEPT-BACK WING PYLONS like a bird of prey. If you see a saucer or disc shape, it is WRONG!

civilian.designLanguage: Sleek but less aggressive, blue-teal transport vessels
civilian.colors: Light blue-teal, silver, gray - arctic industrial

military.designLanguage: RING/CIRCULAR WARP DRIVE is the signature feature - a large ring encircles the elongated hull. ORGANIC FLOWING CURVES with logical efficiency. Ancient wisdom meets advanced technology. Some variants have DORSAL FIN/SAIL structures.
military.colors: BRONZE, COPPER, REDDISH-BROWN hull - warm metallic desert tones. NOT gray like Federation. Subtle blue/amber accent lighting
features: CIRCULAR WARP RING around hull (signature feature)
ELONGATED SMOOTH hull with organic curves

classVariants.D'Kyr: VULCAN D'KYR CLASS: LARGE CIRCULAR WARP RING surrounding elongated bronze hull. Ring is PROMINENT and VERTICAL around the ship. Smooth organic curves. Reference: Enterprise era D'Kyr - the classic Vulcan design
classVariants.Suurok: VULCAN SUUROK CLASS: Combat cruiser. ELONGATED SLEEK hull with WARP RING. More streamlined profile. Bronze/copper. Enhanced weapons for Vulcan standards.
classVariants.Sh'Raan: VULCAN SH'RAAN CLASS: Large cruiser. PROMINENT WARP RING design. Larger than D'Kyr. Bronze hull with copper accents. Imposing but logically designed.
classVariants.Vahklas: VULCAN VAHKLAS TYPE: NO RING - instead has CURVED WING-LIKE structures. More organic flowing shape. Bronze hull. Used by V'tosh ka'tur (Vulcans without logic).
classVariants.Surak: VULCAN SURAK CLASS: Named after the father of logic. Elegant ring-warp cruiser. Bronze with copper details. Perfect logical efficiency.
classVariants.T'Plana Hath: VULCAN T'PLANA HATH TYPE: Early warp vessel. Historical ship that made first contact with Earth. Simpler ring warp configuration. Bronze.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Vulcan defense ship. Compact bronze hull with smaller ring-shaped warp nacelle. Logical minimalist design.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Vulcan cruiser. Bronze hull with prominent ring warp drive. Smooth organic curves. Balanced and efficient.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Vulcan combat vessel. Bronze/copper with large prominent ring warp drive. DORSAL COMMAND STRUCTURE. Ancient yet powerful.
classVariants.Dreadnought: MASSIVE Vulcan flagship. Enormous ring warp drive. Bronze/copper hull. Multiple deck structures. Overwhelming logical precision.

military.important: Vulcan ships have distinctive RING-SHAPED WARP DRIVES encircling the hull - NOT nacelles on pylons! Bronze/copper colors, organic curves, ancient advanced aesthetic.

civilian.designLanguage: Same ring-warp aesthetic but simpler, transport and science vessels

military.designLanguage: COMPACT FUNCTIONAL designs - Federation-allied but with own aesthetic. FLAT ANGULAR hulls with practical layouts. Academic/scientific culture reflected in ship design. Limited canon examples - design based on known Trill shuttle.
military.colors: GRAY, SILVER, DARK GRAY hull - understated and practical. Subtle BLUE or WHITE accent lighting. NOT colorful - functional appearance.

classVariants.Trill Transport: TRILL TRANSPORT: COMPACT FLAT design. Gray/silver hull. Practical shuttle-like vessel. Reference: Known Trill ship from DS9 - the only canon example.
classVariants.Torias: TRILL TORIAS CLASS: Science cruiser. Compact gray hull with sensor arrays. Federation-influenced but distinct. Named for famous host.
classVariants.Curzon: TRILL CURZON CLASS: Diplomatic cruiser. Gray hull with enhanced communications. Named for legendary diplomat.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Trill patrol ship. Compact gray design. Federation-compatible. Quick and practical.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Trill cruiser. Flat angular hull. Gray/silver. Balanced combat and science capability.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Trill warship. Extended gray hull. Reluctant warriors - defensive focused.
classVariants.Science Vessel: TRILL science ship. Extensive sensor arrays. Gray hull with scientific equipment. Academic focus.

military.important: Trill ships are COMPACT, GRAY, PRACTICAL - Federation-allied aesthetic. NOT colorful, NOT overly elegant. Academic/scientific culture.

civilian.designLanguage: Practical compact designs, academic and scientific vessels

military.designLanguage: Mix of SWEPT-WING BIRD-LIKE designs and BLOCKY PRACTICAL resistance-era vessels. Post-occupation ships are sleeker with swept wings. Resistance-era ships are more BOXY and FUNCTIONAL. Warm earthy industrial aesthetic.
military.colors: TAN, BEIGE, BRONZE, BROWN hull colors - warm earthy tones. Some with YELLOW/AMBER accent lights. Weathered, practical appearance. NOT bright gold.

classVariants.Bajoran Interceptor: BAJORAN INTERCEPTOR: SWEPT-BACK WING design like a bird of prey. Bronze-brown hull. Elegant but practical. Post-occupation military vessel.
classVariants.Bajoran Raider: BAJORAN RAIDER: Resistance-era vessel. COMPACT BLOCKY design. Tan/beige hull. Practical and rugged. Built for guerrilla warfare.
classVariants.Assault Vessel: BAJORAN ASSAULT VESSEL: ELONGATED hull with industrial detailing. Gray-brown. Heavy weapons. More aggressive profile.
classVariants.Militia Cruiser: BAJORAN MILITIA CRUISER: Mix of swept-wing and practical design. Bronze-tan hull. Balanced combat vessel.
classVariants.Freighter: BAJORAN FREIGHTER: BOXY PRACTICAL cargo ship. Tan/beige hull. Resistance-era durability. Can be armed.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Bajoran patrol ship. Compact tan hull. Either swept-wing or blocky design depending on era.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Bajoran cruiser. Bronze-tan hull with swept-wing elements. Post-occupation design.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Bajoran warship. Extended swept-wing design or heavy industrial variant. Bronze-brown with yellow accents.
classVariants.Solar Sailor: BAJORAN SOLAR SAILOR: Traditional SOLAR SAIL vessel. Light-driven propulsion. Golden reflective sails like butterfly wings. Ancient spiritual design - DIFFERENT from military ships.

military.important: Bajoran ships are TAN/BRONZE/BROWN - warm earthy colors. Mix of SWEPT-WING bird-like (newer) and BLOCKY PRACTICAL (resistance-era) designs. NOT bright gold, NOT overly spiritual - functional and rugged.

civilian.colors: Tan, beige, bronze, brown - weathered earthy tones

military.designLanguage: CRYSTALLINE GEOMETRIC POLYHEDRON shapes. Ships look like cut gemstones or crystals. Sharp angular facets. Completely alien non-humanoid design.
military.colors: AMBER/ORANGE crystalline hull, RED internal glow, YELLOW energy veins. Like molten glass or volcanic crystal
features: Internal energy glow visible through hull

classVariants.Tholian Vessel: THOLIAN PRIMARY VESSEL: TRIANGULAR/PYRAMIDAL shape with faceted crystalline surfaces. Amber crystal hull with red internal glow. Web-spinning capability. Reference: TOS/ENT Tholian ships
classVariants.Orb Weaver: THOLIAN ORB WEAVER: SPHERICAL faceted crystal design. Web coordination vessel. Amber with red core glow. Like a geometric gemstone.
classVariants.Recluse: THOLIAN RECLUSE CLASS: Carrier/dreadnought. LARGE faceted polyhedron. Multiple geometric sections. Amber-orange with bright energy core.
classVariants.Tarantula: THOLIAN TARANTULA CLASS: Dreadnought. MASSIVE crystalline polyhedron. Multiple facets and weapon arrays. Amber crystal fortress.
classVariants.Widow: THOLIAN WIDOW CLASS: Heavy escort. Compact faceted geometric hull. Enhanced web arrays. Amber with red glow.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Tholian patrol ship. Compact faceted crystal design. Triangular/pyramidal. Amber hull.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Tholian cruiser. Faceted crystalline polyhedron. Amber with red core. Web-capable.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Tholian warship. Multiple faceted sections. Amber crystalline hull. Powerful web arrays.

military.important: Tholian ships are CRYSTALLINE GEOMETRIC SHAPES - faceted like cut gemstones, NOT smooth curves. Completely ALIEN design.

civilian.note: Tholians are extremely xenophobic - very few civilian vessels leave Tholian space

military.designLanguage: CRESCENT/SICKLE-SHAPED hulls - the iconic Orion design is a CURVED BOOMERANG or SCIMITAR shape. Elegant yet menacing. Smooth flowing curves, NOT angular. Some larger vessels have more industrial/blocky designs but maintain green accents.
military.colors: DARK BLUE-GRAY to DARK GREEN hull, GREEN ACCENT LIGHTING along edges and windows, TEAL glow from engines. Subtle wealth display, not gaudy.
features: Curved flowing lines like a blade
Green accent lighting along hull edges

classVariants.Orion Interceptor: ORION INTERCEPTOR: CRESCENT-SHAPED fast attack vessel. Curved sickle hull like a thrown blade. Dark blue-gray with green edge lighting. Quick and deadly.
classVariants.Vandal: ORION VANDAL CLASS: Destroyer with SCIMITAR PROFILE. Curved hull tapering to points. Dark hull with green accents. Reference: STO Orion Destroyer
classVariants.Marauder: ORION MARAUDER: Heavy cruiser. Larger curved design or BLOCKY INDUSTRIAL variant. Dark green-gray. Visible weapon systems and tractor arrays.
classVariants.Slaver: ORION SLAVER: Transport with curved hull. Hidden compartments for 'cargo'. Dark hull, deceptively fast. Green running lights.
classVariants.Blackguard: ORION BLACKGUARD CLASS: Heavy escort. Aggressive curved profile. Maximum weapons. Dark hull with bright green weapon glow.
classVariants.Corsair: ORION CORSAIR: Classic CRESCENT raider. Elegant curved blade shape. Dark blue-gray hull. Green accent lighting. Fast and lethal.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Orion patrol ship. Compact crescent design. Dark hull with green lights. Quick strike vessel.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Orion cruiser. Full crescent/sickle configuration. Dark blue-gray with green accents. Balanced for raiding.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Orion warship. Extended curved hull or industrial blocky design. Dark hull. Syndicate flagship.
classVariants.Carrier: ORION carrier. Wide curved hull with launch bays. Dark with green coordination lights.

military.important: Orion ships have iconic CRESCENT/SICKLE/SCIMITAR shapes - curved like elegant blades. Dark blue-gray to green hulls with GREEN ACCENT LIGHTING. NOT blocky pirate ships!

civilian.designLanguage: Same curved aesthetic but less aggressive, merchant vessels with hidden capabilities
civilian.colors: Dark gray-green, muted green accents. Plausible deniability

military.designLanguage: HEAVY INDUSTRIAL HUNTER vessels - MASSIVE, BLOCKY, UTILITARIAN designs covered in pipes, greebles, and equipment. Ships look like CONVERTED MINING/INDUSTRIAL vessels modified for hunting. Asymmetric, chaotic assembly. Trophy displays.
military.colors: OLIVE GREEN, DARK BROWN, GRAY, BRONZE metallic hull. YELLOW/AMBER accent lights and windows. Weathered, industrial appearance. NOT sleek or elegant.
features: Massive sensor arrays for tracking prey

classVariants.Hunter: HIROGEN HUNTER: Primary hunting vessel. BLOCKY INDUSTRIAL design with massive sensor dome. Olive/brown hull with yellow lights. Tractor beams for capturing prey. Reference: VOY Hirogen vessel
classVariants.Apex: HIROGEN APEX CLASS: Heavy hunter. LARGER industrial design with enhanced weapons. Trophy room. Dark olive with amber glow. Alpha's command ship.
classVariants.Venatic: HIROGEN VENATIC CLASS: Fast pursuit vessel. More streamlined but still industrial. Dark brown hull. High speed chase capability.
classVariants.Escort: HIROGEN ESCORT: Support vessel for hunting packs. Industrial olive hull. Coordinates with main hunters.
classVariants.Frigate: SMALL Hirogen patrol ship. Compact industrial design. Olive-brown hull. Scout and tracking vessel.
classVariants.Cruiser: MEDIUM Hirogen cruiser. Full industrial hunter configuration. Olive/brown with extensive sensor arrays. Pack leader vessel.
classVariants.Battleship: LARGE Hirogen warship. MASSIVE industrial hull. Heavy weapons and armor. Alpha hunter flagship. Olive-gray with trophy displays.
classVariants.Carrier: HIROGEN carrier. Industrial design with fighter bays. Launches hunter shuttles. Dark olive with amber launch bay lighting.

military.important: Hirogen ships are HEAVY INDUSTRIAL HUNTERS - blocky, utilitarian, olive/brown with yellow lights. NOT sleek, NOT elegant. Like converted mining ships modified for the hunt.

civilian.note: Hirogen society is entirely focused on the hunt - there are no true civilian vessels
civilian.designLanguage: Support and supply vessels for hunting packs - still industrial

military.designLanguage: CONVERTED CIVILIAN SHIPS - improvised weapons, guerrilla modifications. Mixed origins: Federation, Bajoran, purchased/stolen vessels. Rugged, practical, battle-worn.
military.colors: Earth tones, camouflage browns and greens, weathered hull plates, minimal markings to avoid detection.

classVariants.Raider: MAQUIS RAIDER: Fast converted freighter with hidden weapons. Brown/green hull, weathered appearance. Quick strike capability.
classVariants.Fighter: MAQUIS FIGHTER: Small attack craft, often Peregrine-class. Maneuverable, lightly armed. Earth tone colors.
classVariants.Transport: MAQUIS ARMED TRANSPORT: Cargo ship with concealed weapons. Looks civilian until weapons deploy.
classVariants.Interceptor: MAQUIS INTERCEPTOR: Fast pursuit vessel. Stripped down for speed, minimal armor.
classVariants.Frigate: Small converted vessel with added weapons.

military.important: Maquis ships are CONVERTED CIVILIAN vessels, not purpose-built warships. Improvised, weathered, camouflaged. Think guerrilla fighters, not military fleet.

civilian.designLanguage: Standard civilian vessels, often disguised or running dark

military.designLanguage: STOLEN AND MODIFIED ships from ALL factions. Intimidating modifications, skull imagery, mismatched parts. Each ship unique - cobbled together from various sources.
military.colors: Dark colors: black, rust red, gunmetal. Skull and crossbones markings. Blood red accents. Weathered, battle-damaged appearance.

classVariants.Raider: PIRATE RAIDER: Fast attack ship, stolen and modified. Dark hull with skull markings. Built for quick raids.
classVariants.Gunboat: PIRATE GUNBOAT: Heavy weapons platform. Intimidating appearance, blood red accents.
classVariants.Cruiser: PIRATE CRUISER: Stolen military vessel, modified with pirate aesthetics.
classVariants.Battleship: PIRATE BATTLESHIP: Rare captured capital ship. Ultimate pirate flagship.
classVariants.Boarding: PIRATE BOARDING SHIP: Specialized for capturing other vessels. Grappling equipment, assault pods.
classVariants.Frigate: Small pirate vessel for quick strikes.

military.important: Pirate ships are STOLEN and MODIFIED from various factions. No uniform design - each ship is unique. Dark, intimidating, skull imagery.

civilian.designLanguage: Disguised pirate vessels, fake merchant ships

military.designLanguage: ORGANIC BIOSHIPS - completely living vessels. NO metal, NO technology. Purple/violet bioluminescence. Tentacle/organic forms. Grown, not built.
military.colors: DEEP PURPLE, VIOLET, bioluminescent greens, organic browns. Pulsing light patterns. Living tissue appearance.

classVariants.Bioship: SPECIES 8472 BIOSHIP: Standard organic warship. Purple/violet with bioluminescent patterns. Extremely powerful bio-pulse weapon.
classVariants.Dreadnought: SPECIES 8472 DREADNOUGHT: Massive organic warship. Planet-killer capability. Terrifying organic design.

military.important: Species 8472 ships are COMPLETELY ORGANIC - no metal, no technology. Living vessels that are GROWN. Purple/violet with bioluminescence. Terrifying alien appearance.

civilian.note: Species 8472 does not distinguish military/civilian - all vessels serve the collective purpose

military.designLanguage: BRUTAL, HEAVY, CRUDE warships. Functional over elegant. Rough industrial construction with visible armor plating. Intimidating and aggressive. Built for raiding and mercenary work.
military.colors: Dark browns, grays, rust, gunmetal. Weathered and battle-scarred. Utilitarian and intimidating.

classVariants.Raider: NAUSICAAN RAIDER: Fast attack vessel for hit-and-run raids. Dark brown/gray hull. Heavy forward weapons.
classVariants.Fighter: NAUSICAAN FIGHTER: Small aggressive attack craft. Brutal, angular design.
classVariants.Cruiser: NAUSICAAN CRUISER: Main combat vessel. Heavy armor, intimidating profile.
classVariants.Battleship: NAUSICAAN BATTLESHIP: Heavy warship. Massive armor, brutal aesthetics.

military.important: Nausicaan ships are BRUTAL and CRUDE but effective. Heavy armor, intimidating designs. Built for raiding, piracy, and mercenary work. Dark browns and grays.

civilian.designLanguage: Same brutal industrial aesthetic as military

styleGuide.material: Claymation 3D style - handmade plasticine model look, matte hull surfaces
styleGuide.lighting: Dramatic space lighting, engine glows, window lights
styleGuide.composition: 3/4 isometric view showing ship profile clearly
critical: Each faction has UNIQUE design language - no cross-contamination
Each ship CLASS within a faction has DISTINCT silhouette
Civilian ships must NOT look like warships
Reference the SPECIFIC ship class, not just faction default
